00031 bool Input::Wiimote::init(Input::InputDeviceInit &deviceInit){
00032         int found, connected = 0;
00033         //call the base class version first.
00034         InputDevice::init(deviceInit);
00035 
00036         Input::WiimoteInit *wiimoteInit = ((WiimoteInit*)&deviceInit);
00037 
00038         //wiiuse_startup(WIIUSE_PATH);
00039 
00040         moteID = 1;
00041         
00042         wiimotes =  wiiuse_init(1);
00043 
00044         found = wiiuse_find(wiimotes, 1, 5);
00045         if (!found)
00046                 return false;
00047         connected = wiiuse_connect(wiimotes, 1);
00048         if (connected)
00049                 printf("Connected to %i wiimotes (of %i found).\n", connected, found);
00050         else {
00051                 printf("Failed to connect to any wiimote.\n");
00052                 return false;
00053         }
00054 
00055         wiiuse_set_leds(wiimotes[0], WIIMOTE_LED_1 | WIIMOTE_LED_4);
00056         wiiuse_rumble(wiimotes[0], 1);
00057 
00058         Sleep(200);
00059 
00060         wiiuse_rumble(wiimotes[0], 0);
00061         wiiuse_motion_sensing(wiimotes[0], 1);
00062         this->release();
00063 
00064         return true;
00065 }
00066 bool Input::Wiimote::read(){
00067         InputDevice::read();
00068 
00069         if (wiimotes == NULL){
00070                 return false;
00071         }
00072         if (wiiuse_poll(wiimotes, 1)) {
00073         /*
00074          *      This happens if something happened on any wiimote.
00075          *      So go through each one and check if anything happened.
00076          */
00077                 int i = 0;
00078                 for (; i < 1; ++i) {
00079                         switch (wiimotes[i]->event) {
00080                                 case WIIUSE_EVENT:
00081                                         /* a generic event occured */
00082                                         handle_event(wiimotes[i]);
00083                                         break;
00084 
00085                                 case WIIUSE_STATUS:
00086                                         /* a status event occured */
00087                                         handle_ctrl_status(wiimotes[i]);
00088                                         break;
00089 
00090                                 case WIIUSE_DISCONNECT:
00091                                         /* the wiimote disconnected */
00092                                         //handle_disconnect(wiimotes[i]);
00093                                         break;
00094 
00095                                 default:
00096                                         break;
00097                         }
00098                 }
00099         }
00100         return true;
00101 }

00123 bool Input::Wiimote::buttonStatus(int code) const{
00124         InputDevice::buttonStatus(code);
00125         if (code == Input::Wiimote::WII_MOVE_HANDS_OUTWARD){
00126                 return hands_out;
00127         }
00128         else if (code == Input::Wiimote::WII_MOVE_HANDS_INWARD){
00129                 return hands_in;
00130         }
00131         else if (code == Input::Wiimote::WII_RIGHT_HAND_UP){
00132                 return right_hand_up;
00133         }
00134         else if (code == Input::Wiimote::WII_RIGHT_HAND_LEFT){
00135                 return right_hand_left;
00136         }
00137         else if (code == Input::Wiimote::WII_RIGHT_HAND_RIGHT){
00138                 return right_hand_right;
00139         }
00140         else if (code == Input::Wiimote::WII_BOTH_HANDS_DOWN){
00141                 return both_hands_down;
00142         }
00143 
00144                 return (wiimotes[0]->btns & code) == code;
00145         
00146 
00147 }

00355                         break;
00356 
00357         };
00358 
00359         if (receiver->keyPressed(Input::Keyboard::KEY_LSHIFT) || receiver->keyPressed(Input::Keyboard::KEY_RSHIFT)){
00360                 output = toupper(output);
00361         }
00362         if(output != ' ' || receiver->keyPressed(Input::Keyboard::KEY_SPACE)){
00363                 return output;
00364         }
00365 
00366 
00367         switch(key){
00368                 //Shift not being pressed.
00369                 case Input::Keyboard::KEY_0:
00370                         output = '0';
00371                         break;
00372                 case Input::Keyboard::KEY_1:
00373                         output = '1';
00374                         break;
00375                 case Input::Keyboard::KEY_2:
00376                         output = '2';
00377                         break;
00378                 case Input::Keyboard::KEY_3:
00379                         output = '3';
00380                         break;
00381                 case Input::Keyboard::KEY_4:
00382                         output = '4';
00383                         break;
00384                 case Input::Keyboard::KEY_5:
00385                         output = '5';

00388                         output = '6';
00389                         break;

00391                         output = '7';

00393                 case Input::Keyboard::KEY_8:
00394                         output = '8';
00395                         break;
00396                 case Input::Keyboard::KEY_9:
00397                         output = '9';
00398                         break;
00399         };
00400         
00401 
00402         return output;

00405 std::string& Input::Keyboard::appendtoString(std::string &string, char c, bool backspace){

00407                 return string.append(&c);
00408         }
00409         else{
00410                 if (string.length() > 0)
00411                         return string.erase(string.length() - 1, 1);
00412         }
00413         return string;

00434 void Input::Action::addCode(int code, Input::InputDevice &device){
00435         if (deviceCodeMap.find(device.getName()) != deviceCodeMap.end()){
00436                 std::set<std::set<int> > codeList;
00437                 std::set<int> codes;
00438                 codes.insert(code);
00439                 codeList.insert(codes);
00440                 deviceCodeMap.insert(make_pair(device.getName(), codeList));
00441         }
00442         else{
00443                 std::set<int> codes;
00444                 codes.insert(code);
00445                 deviceCodeMap[device.getName()].insert(codes);
00446         }
00447         reset();
00448 }
00449

00453                 codeList.insert(codes);
00454                 deviceCodeMap.insert(make_pair(device.getName(), codeList));
00455         }
00456         else{
00457                 deviceCodeMap[device.getName()].insert(codes);
00458         }
00459         reset();
00460 }

00467 int Input::Action::getAmount(){
00468         int retVal = m_Amount;
00469     if (retVal != 0) {
00470                 if (m_State == Action::STATE_RELEASED) {
00471             m_Amount = 0;
00472         }
00473                 else if (m_Behavior == Action::BEHAVIOR_DETECT_PRESS) {
00474                         m_State = Action::STATE_WAITING_FOR_RELEASE;
00475             m_Amount = 0;
00476         }
00477     }
00478     return retVal;
00479 }

00494 void Input::Action::release(){
00495         if (m_Behavior == Input::Action::BEHAVIOR_DETECT_RELEASE){
00496                 m_Amount += 1;
00497         }
00498         m_State = Input::Action::STATE_RELEASED;
00499 }
00500 
00501 void Input::Action::press(){
00502         press(1);
00503 }
00504 
00505 void Input::Action::press(const int amount){
00506         if (m_State != Action::STATE_WAITING_FOR_RELEASE) {
00507                 if (m_Behavior != Input::Action::BEHAVIOR_DETECT_RELEASE){
00508                         m_Amount += amount;
00509                 }
00510                 m_State = Action::STATE_PRESSED;
00511     }
00512 }
00513 
00514 void Input::Action::checkButtonStatus(){
00515         //Iterates over devices that this action uses
00516         std::map<std::string, std::set<std::set<int > > >::iterator deviceIter;
00517         //This flag says whether to release the button or not.
00518         bool pushedFlag = false;
00519         for (deviceIter = deviceCodeMap.begin(); deviceIter != deviceCodeMap.end(); deviceIter++){
00520                 //Get current device to reduce string lookups
00521                 Input::InputDevice& currentDevice = (InputManager::getSingleton().getDevice((*deviceIter).first));
00522                 //Iterates over codes registered with this device for this action.
00523                 std::set<std::set<int> >::iterator codeListIter, codeListIterEnd;
00524                 codeListIterEnd = (*deviceIter).second.end();
00525                 for (codeListIter = (*deviceIter).second.begin(); codeListIter != codeListIterEnd; codeListIter++){
00526                         //Checks if the code on this device has been pressed.
00527                         bool simultaneousPress = true;
00528                         std::set<int>::iterator codeIter;
00529                         
00530                         for (codeIter = (*codeListIter).begin(); codeIter != (*codeListIter).end(); codeIter++){
00531 
00532                                 if (currentDevice.buttonStatus(*codeIter)){
00533                                         continue;
00534                                 }
00535                                 else{
00536                                         simultaneousPress = false;
00537                                         break;
00538                                 }
00539                         }
00540                         if(simultaneousPress){
00541                                 pushedFlag = true;
00542                                 if (m_Behavior == Input::Action::BEHAVIOR_DETECT_PRESS || m_Behavior == Input::Action::BEHAVIOR_DETECT_RELEASE){
00543                                         this->press();
00544                                 }
00545                                 else if (m_Behavior == Input::Action::BEHAVIOR_DETECT_TAP){
00546                                         this->tap();
00547                                 }
00548 
00549                         }
00550                 }
00551 
00552         }
00553         //Releases button if none of the registered codes have been pressed.
00554         if (!pushedFlag && m_State != Input::Action::STATE_RELEASED){
00555                 this->release();
00556         }
00557 }

00559 const int Input::Action::BEHAVIOR_DETECT_PRESS =  1 << 0;
00560 const int Input::Action::BEHAVIOR_DETECT_TAP = 1 << 1;
00561 const int Input::Action::BEHAVIOR_DETECT_RELEASE = 1 << 2;
00562 
00563 const int Input::Action::STATE_PRESSED = 1 << 0;
00564 const int Input::Action::STATE_RELEASED = 1 << 1;
00565 const int Input::Action::STATE_WAITING_FOR_RELEASE = 1 << 2;

00568 Input::Action* InputManager::createAction(const std::string name, Input::InputDevice& device, int code, int behaviorFlag){
00569         m_ActionItr = m_ActionMap.find(name);
00570         if(m_ActionItr != m_ActionMap.end()){
00571                 std::set<int> codes;
00572                 codes.insert(code);
00573                 m_ActionItr->second->addCode(codes, device);
00574                 return m_ActionItr->second;
00575         }
00576         Input::Action* action = new Input::Action(name, code, device);
00577         action->m_Behavior = behaviorFlag;
00578         m_ActionMap.insert(make_pair(name, action));
00579         return action;
00580 }
00581 
00582 Input::Action* InputManager::createAction(const std::string name, int behaviorFlag){
00583         m_ActionItr = m_ActionMap.find(name);
00584         if(m_ActionItr != m_ActionMap.end()){
00585                 return m_ActionItr->second;
00586         }
00587         Input::Action* action = new Input::Action(name);
00588         action->m_Behavior = behaviorFlag;
00589         m_ActionMap.insert(make_pair(name, action));
00590         return action;
00591 }
00592 Input::Action* InputManager::getAction(const std::string& name){
00593         //Find the Action in the map according to the given string
00594         m_ActionItr = m_ActionMap.find(name);
00595 
00596         if(m_ActionItr == m_ActionMap.end()){
00597                 Input::Action* action = new Input::Action(name);
00598                 action->m_Behavior = Input::Action::BEHAVIOR_DETECT_PRESS;
00599                 m_ActionMap.insert(make_pair(name, action));
00600                 return action;
00601         }
00602 
00603         return m_ActionItr->second;
00604 
00605 }
00606 
00607 bool InputManager::deleteAction( const std::string & sActionName){
00608         //Find the Action in the map according to the given string
00609         m_ActionItr = m_ActionMap.find(sActionName);
00610         //If the Action wasn't found, return false
00611         if(m_ActionItr == m_ActionMap.end())
00612                 return false;
00613 
00614         delete m_ActionItr->second;
00615         m_ActionMap.erase(m_ActionItr);
00616         return true;
00617 }

00619 MastEventReceiver* InputManager::getEventReceiver(){
00620         return receiver;
00621 }
00622 bool InputManager::init(){
00623         receiver = new MastEventReceiver();
00624         receiver->init();
00625 
00626         m_Keyboard.receiver = receiver;
00627         
00628         if (!m_Wiimote.init(m_WiimoteInit))
00629                 return(false);
00630         if (!m_Keyboard.init(m_KeyboardInit))
00631                 return(false);
00632 
00633         Input::InputDevice* pKeyboard = &m_Keyboard;
00634         Input::InputDevice* pWiimote = &m_Wiimote;
00635 
00636         m_DeviceMap.insert(make_pair(m_Wiimote.getName(), pWiimote));
00637         m_DeviceMap.insert(make_pair(m_Keyboard.getName(), pKeyboard));
00638         //return success
00639         return(true);
00640 }

00642 void InputManager::resumePolling(){

00650 void InputManager::stopPolling(){
00651         if (receiver){
00652                 receiver->endEventProcess();
00653         }
00654 }
00655 
00656 Input::InputDevice& InputManager::getDevice(const std::string& name){
00657         //Find the Device in the map according to the given string
00658         Input::StrDeviceMap::iterator iter = m_DeviceMap.find(name);
00659         //If the Device wasn't found, return false
00660         //if(iter == m_DeviceMap.end()) //Don't know how to return a NULL value
00661                 //return NULL;
00662 
00663         return *((*iter).second);
00664 
00665 }
00666 void InputManager::shutdown(){
00667         //Reset all actions, just cause
00668         resetAllActions();
00669         //Delete and remove all actions from the map.
00670         for(m_ActionItr = m_ActionMap.begin(); m_ActionItr != m_ActionMap.end(); ++m_ActionItr)
00671         {
00672                 delete m_ActionItr->second;
00673         }
00674         m_ActionMap.clear();
00675         //have the keyboard and mouse shut themselves down.
00676         m_Keyboard.release();
00677         m_Wiimote.release();
00678         //delete irrilicht input receiver
00679         if (receiver){
00680                 delete receiver;
00681         }
00682 
00683 }
00684 
00685 
00686 bool InputManager::getInput(){
00687 
00688         m_Wiimote.read();
00689         m_Keyboard.read();
00690 
00691         for(m_ActionItr = m_ActionMap.begin(); m_ActionItr != m_ActionMap.end(); ++m_ActionItr)
00692         {
00693                 m_ActionItr->second->checkButtonStatus();
00694         }
00695 
00696         return true;
00697 
00698 }
00699 
00700 void InputManager::resetAllActions(){
00701         for(m_ActionItr = m_ActionMap.begin(); m_ActionItr != m_ActionMap.end(); ++m_ActionItr)
00702         {
00703                 m_ActionItr->second->reset();
00704         }
00705 }
00706 
00707 InputManager::InputManager() : receiver(NULL){
00708 
00709 }
00710 
00711 InputManager::~InputManager(){
00712         this->shutdown();
00713 }

00716 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const Input::InputDevice& device){
00717         return os << device.getName();
00718 }

00720 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const Input::Action& action){
00721         return os << action.getName();
